doc.title: Phantasy Star II
doc.plot: Somewhere in the deep vastness of space, within the Andromeda Galaxy lies the Algol Star System floating like a dust fleck in a sunbeam. Around the parent star, Algol, whirl its three children: Palm, Mota, and Dezo. Closest to Algo is Palm, the economic and intellectual stronghold of the system. Of the three planets the middle gleamed the brightest like an emerald. This is Mota, a beautiful, beckoning jewel gripped by madness!
